sqlMap.select:
select
distinct
from B_CRR_LN_CON
order by $orderByClause$

select c.LOAN_PERCENT as LOANPER from B_CRR_LN_CON a,B_CRM_BASE_INFO b,B_CNT_DEBT_INFO c where c.CUSTCD = b.CUSTCD and a.VID_NO = c.DEBT_CONTNO
a.PRD_ID = #prdid:VARCHAR#
b.CUSTCD = #custId:VARCHAR#
b.CNAME like '%'|| #cname:VARCHAR#||'%'
a.VID_BUSI_TYP = #vidBusiTyp:VARCHAR#
